testsuite.name: FlashcardsTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #3
Your line `Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit):` should contain `0 cards have been saved` (ignoring case).
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit): >export File name: >capitals.txt Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit): >export File name: >capitalsNew.txt Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit): >exit Bye Bye!
